can be sugar water, honey, glucose, water, gur, janam-ghutti, saunf-water or ajwain water etc.) 
 ∙ Prelacteal feeds may lead to infection, interfere with the success of breastfeeding and the baby will not get the 
advantages of colostrum feeding.
 ∙ Mother should be advised to seek support if mother faces any problem in breastfeeding from health workers 
– ASHA/ANM/CHO/MO. (You may refer to the module on newborn, infant and child health services for
